reviews.subject: Psychology 101
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and very knowledgeable. Sometimes a bit too fast-paced, but overall a great professor.

reviews.subject: Computer Science 201
reviews.review: Excellent professor. Clear explanations, helpful in office hours, and really cares about students.

reviews.subject: Biology 110
reviews.review: Material is interesting, but lectures can be dry. Attendance is important for understanding.

reviews.subject: Mathematics 203
reviews.review: Very difficult class. Exams are tough, and lectures can be confusing. Be prepared to work hard.

reviews.subject: History 102
reviews.review: Great storyteller, makes history come alive. Sometimes hard to follow due to the amount of content covered.

reviews.subject: Physics 220
reviews.review: One of the best professors I've had. Very clear and approachable, and his enthusiasm for the subject is contagious.

reviews.subject: English Literature 150
reviews.review: Interesting readings, but the grading is tough. Make sure to participate in discussions.

reviews.subject: Chemistry 101
reviews.review: Challenging class but very rewarding. Dr. White is always willing to help if you ask.

reviews.subject: Sociology 200
reviews.review: Amazing professor! She makes the material relatable and is very supportive of students.

reviews.subject: Political Science 101
reviews.review: Lectures are not very engaging, and the exams are hard. Make sure to do all the readings.

reviews.subject: Economics 101
reviews.review: Good professor, but the class moves quickly. Be prepared to study a lot outside of class.

reviews.subject: Philosophy 101
reviews.review: Thought-provoking lectures and great discussions. Sometimes the material can be abstract.

reviews.subject: Anthropology 110
reviews.review: Fascinating course with an excellent professor. Dr. Rodriguez is very passionate about the subject.

reviews.subject: Statistics 101
reviews.review: Material can be dry, but Dr. Lewis is clear in his explanations. Make sure to attend lectures.

reviews.subject: Art History 101
reviews.review: Wonderful professor with a deep knowledge of the subject. Sometimes covers too much material too quickly.

reviews.subject: Philosophy 201
reviews.review: Incredible professor. He challenges students to think critically and makes every class interesting.

reviews.subject: Literature 202
reviews.review: Lectures are not very engaging, and the readings are dense. Difficult to stay motivated.

reviews.subject: Engineering 301
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable and supportive. The coursework is tough but fair. Great professor for those who are serious about engineering.

reviews.subject: Psychology 202
reviews.review: Interesting material, but the professor's lectures can be a bit disorganized. Participation is key.

reviews.subject: Chemistry 201
reviews.review: One of the best professors in the department. Clear explanations, fair grading, and genuinely wants students to succeed.
